Hi guys,
I'm new in the group and I couldn't find anything on testing 
comb=
ination in the title.

I have applicationContext.xml where EntityManagerFac=
tory is 
configured. Model classes are mapped using Annotations. My service=
 
classes (DAO - for example BankImpl) implements interfaces (for 
example =
Bank). Methods from these implementation are called in Struts2 
action clas=
ses (injected).

How can I configure my tests to be runnable as single test=
s and as 
Maven2 tests? Is there any simple example - tutorial? Should I ha=
ve 
separate applicationContext-test.xml?
